body:
Certain people don't deserve respect. You included. Stay mad. You already know you're worth nothing.

People who cheer on bullying and humiliating and ruining other people's live deserve every bit of disgust. How is it hypocritical ^^. Bye now, you were funny but sadly you're just.. An aweful person

Oh my look at this person below me speaking about hypocrisy and other people talking about bad stuff on other doujin's wich he himself insults people on a personal level and goes to ntr just to type out unwanted stupid shit Which he could so easily black list... Why are you in so much denial idiot. Also wish those people just dropped? Then you should be included too dumbass
Sooo... It's just all copy paste? Like the same characters and everything? And people insult other genres but hold these in high regard? Talk about hypocrisy. Wish those people just dropped.
